text: Mahmud Shabestari (1288-1340; ) is a Persian Sufi poet. He was born in the city of Tabriz. His most famous poem is called Gulshan-i Rāz (Persian: meaning "A Secret Rose Garden"). Gulshan-i Rāz is an important Sufi text. Category:Persian poets Category:1288 births Category:1340 deaths
title: Shabestari
